A '''man of the [[Night's Watch]]''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is played by guest star [[Patrick Molloy]] and appears in "[[Breaker of Chains]]".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
He is a member of the [[Night's Watch]].
===[[Season 4]]===
He brings a number of recruits to [[Castle Black]], and lists their reasons for being sent to [[the Wall]] to one of his brothers.<ref>"[[Breaker of Chains]]"</ref>
